remarks: Topology of a structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
statement:
prdstopn.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdstopn.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdstopn.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdstopn.r $e |- ( ph -> R Fn I ) $.
prdstopn.o $e |- O = ( TopOpen ` Y ) $.
prdstopn $p |- ( ph -> O = ( Xt_ ` ( TopOpen o. R ) ) ) $.
